result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (4th) [Modifiers: alcohol concentration enhancer] and Operating w/ PAC (5th) .266 [Modifiers: Modifier-Alcohol Concentration (>=.25)]. The defendant was found guilty of OWI (4th) [Modifiers: alcohol concentration enhancer] and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (5th) .266 [Modifiers: Modifier-Alcohol Concentration (>=.25)] was dismissed by the court.

  • Donald J. Winters was found guilty of OWI (4th) [Modifiers: alcohol concentration enhancer], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).
  • Donald J. Winters was found guilty of Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

No controlled substances without a valid prescription in defendant's own name.

Comply with any conditions per agent.

DEFENDANT MUST COMPLY WITH THE BOND MONITORING PROGRAM.  
DEFENDANT MAY ONLY BE RELEASED ON WEEKDAYS (EXCLUDING HOLIDAYS) FROM 8:00 A.M. UNTIL 4:00 P.M.  DEFENDANT MUST GO IMMEDIATELY TO THE JUSTICE PROGRAMS OFFICE UPON SIGNING OF BOND AND/OR RELEASE.  THE BOND MONITORING PROGRAM IS LOCATED AT 919 HOESCHLER DRIVE, SUITE 100, SPARTA, WI.
CURFEW FROM 7:00 P.M. UNTIL 7:00 A.M. EXCEPT FOR WORK, TREATMENT OR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY IF APPROVED BY BOND MONITORING AHEAD OF TIME.
Defendant is allowed to be free of the curfew conditions of his bond only while he is traveling to visit his father in Kalamazoo, Michigan on dates approved by the Monroe County Justice Department.
Not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed to drive in Wisconsin.
No consumption or possession of alcohol.  No entering taverns, bars or liquor stores for any purpose.
No controlled substances without a valid prescription in own name.
